item.title: Azure Resource Group Enterprise Scale Landing Zone queries
item.description: Azure Resource Graph Examples THis is just a quick post. I am slowly working on building a collection of Resource Grpah Queries - they can be found here and will grow over time. It just takes some time to build these. They will be broken down into a folder structure based upon the Critical Design Areas of Enterprise Scale Landing Zone Hope this helps and keep an eye out for more.
